descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: A platformfor corporate wide communications is needed, as employees are hindered withdaily business communications and there is a chance of missing corporatecommunications in the flood of emails. A better communication channel,Microsoft Teams, will allow them to get focused communication and act on it.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
The Company Communicator customization enablescorporate teams to create, schedule and send messages intended for multipleteams or large number of employees (using DLs) over Teams Channels and personalchat allowing organization to reach employees right where they collaborate.
This solution can be used for multiple scenarios suchas targeted communications, employee onboarding, modern learning anddevelopment or organization-wide broadcasts.
The solution provides an easy interface fordesignated users to create, preview, collaborate, schedule and send messages.Extended custom functionality allows authors to edit and delete sent messages,also provides extended telemetry like user reactions to messages.
Customizations also provides options to createmultiple BU specific groups and assign admins to those groups. This will allowGroup Admin to send targeted communications for the selected groups/DLs forwhich they are allowed to.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content:
